string.name: btnSoftResetTooltip
string.value: All parameters are set to their factory default values, except basic network settings like IP address, subnet and gateway or DHCP settings

string.name: btnHardResetTooltip
string.value: All parameters are set to their factory default values

string.name: factorySoftSuccess
string.value: Factory default settings except basic network settings like IP address, subnet and gateway or DHCP settings have been applied successfully. Device is being rebooted. Please wait while it appears in the device list.

string.name: factoryHardSuccess
string.value: Factory default settings have been applied successfully. Device is being rebooted. Please wait while it appears in the device list.

string.name: rebootSuccess
string.value: Device is being rebooted. Please wait while it appears in the device list.

string.name: waitWhileAppear
string.value: Please wait while the device appears in the device list.

string.name: restoreSuccess
string.value: Device has been restored successfully. Please wait when it will appear in device list.

string.name: modifiedSuccess
string.value: The profile has been modified successfully. Channel will be reloaded.

string.name: deletingSuccess
string.value: The profile has been deleted successfully. Channel will be reloaded.

string.name: infoDisplacement
string.value: INFO: The depth of the scene is not enough. Please extend the distance between the upper and the lower markers. The distance must be not less than 1 / 4 of screen.
